posts.post_title: FT: 1909-11 T206 Christy Mathewson (Tolstoi) SGC 30 & 1910 T209 Contentnea Tiedeman
posts.post_content:
Hello everyone,

For trade are these 1909-1911 T206 Christy Mathewson (Tolstoi, Dark Cap) SGC 30 and 1910 T209 Contentnea Tiedeman SGC 40. Scans are available of the fronts and backs. Looking for the following

1933 Delong
1933 George C. Miller
1934-36 Batter-Up
Signed Pre-War Cards
1911 T211 Red Sun type
T215 Red Cross type

Thanks so much!

James
